summary: Adds the weapon Shibuki, one of the blades of the Seven Swordsman.
descriptionHtml:
Adds the weapon Shibuki, one of the blades of the Seven Swordsman. Weapon is a collaboration between myself, and Urwy.

Adds a craftable and upgradeable Standalone weapon.

There is now an alternate version that explodes.
WARNING: the explosions are bright and flashy, as well as blinding. In 1st person, its like having a flash bang go off in your face.  keep safe people, don\'t use the explosive version with the lights off, or if your susceptible to seizures.

Both use separate ESPs, to allow a player to have one or both. The explosive version requires additional components to produce (ink and paper, for the exploding tags lol), and has the same name.
author: Cha0sr1pper and Urwy
